scripts.start:showcase: pnpm install && pnpm build:components && cd apps/showcase && pnpm install && pnpm start
scripts.start:ThemeShowcase: pnpm install && pnpm --filter @brightlayer-ui/react-themes build && pnpm --filter react-showcase-demo start
scripts.start:workflow:example: pnpm install && pnpm --filter @brightlayer-ui/react-auth-workflow build && pnpm --filter example start
scripts.start:workflow:example-vite: pnpm install && pnpm --filter @brightlayer-ui/react-auth-workflow build && pnpm --filter vite-example start
scripts.start:docs: pnpm install && cd docs && pnpm install && pnpm start
